original_title: A NEW AND FUN WAY TO SPEND YOUR MORNINGS, AND MORE EFFECTIVE AT BUSTING THE LEFTIST HR PAJEET HIRING SCAM.. FITS PERFECT WITH YOUR SHIT-POSTING CAREER ALSO..     — The Donald
article_summary: Campaign urges Nashville residents to scan local newspaper job listings and send them to a designated account to expose potential H1-B visa abuse by companies hiring foreign workers over Americans. The goal is to trigger government audits and prevent the practice.</s>
